LanguageData.HMW__GuardianShield.label: guardian shield
LanguageData.HMW__GuardianShield.description:
A shield designed to take a beating.
The Guardian Shield is capable of tanking a barrage of heavy charge blaster once its shields are active. Use this to get your troops in melee range.
LanguageData.HMW__GuardianShield.comps.Comp_ExtendedS: Toggles whether you want to extend your shield or not.
